trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> che contiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TabItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TabItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della classe di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associata a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della classe di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem" />; altrimenti, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
trans-unit.target: Nasconde tutti i nodi, i controlli o il contenuto che sono discendenti del controllo.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Visualizza tutti i nodi figlio, i controlli o il contenuto del controllo.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato espanso o compresso del controllo associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Stato del controllo associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: Scorre l'area di contenuto di un oggetto contenitore per visualizzare il controllo all'interno dell'area visibile del contenitore.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: API non implementata.

trans-unit.source: The user cannot interact with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: L'utente non può interagire con l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A element other than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: È stato selezionato un elemento diverso da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: API non implementata.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Viene selezionato <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
